wordGroup: shortness of breath 气促；呼吸浅短

sentences.en: Other signs of angina are nausea, sweating, feeling faint and shortness of breath.
sentences.cn: 心绞痛的其他征兆是恶心、出汗、感觉虚弱晕眩和气短。

sentences.en: She suffered from shortness of breath.
Will my sociall status borever be marked by my shortness?
sentences.cn: 我的社会地位将永远被标着一个“矮子”的记号吗？
